'''Lynette''' is a playable {{Ousia}}-aligned {{Anemo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Quiet and reserved, Lynette functions as a magician's assistant to her brother [[Lyney]]. After their parents' death and having been saved from an abusive noble by their "[[Arlecchino|Father]]," Lynette has also served as "eyes" and "ears" for the [[House of the Hearth]].
